thing.name: Changing Table
thing.text:
A Changing table with 3 drawers and a laundry basket.
The bottom panel sometimes comes loose (see picture).

thing.name: Table and 4 Chairs
thing.text:
A table with 4 chairs (only 2 seen in the pictures).
Table can be opened and extended (extensions stored under it).

thing.name: Home Bundle (Blanket, Pillows, etc...)
thing.text:
"Welcome to Oxford" Home Bundle:
- The main part of the bundle is not in the pictures: Double wool duvet, Double summer blanket, Double duvet (very warm), Double duvet (medium-warmth), 2 excellent Single duvets, Single light duvet, 5 excellent pillows, 4 simple pillows, 3 bath mats.

- 1st picture: Bundle of sheets (mostly double, some single), and towels. (There are more not in the picture).
- 2nd picture: Laundry hamper and 2 vases.
- 3rd picture: Mirror
- 4th picture: Laundry basket
- 5th picture: Laundry rack.

thing.name: Cot Bed with Mothercare Mattress
thing.text:
A cot bed with a Mothercare mattress:
We bought the mattress brand new, and used it for 1.5 years.
The cot bed is used, and the back panel has to be secured with zip ties. Other than that the cot bed is fine.

thing.name: Swing Set
thing.text:
Plum 2 in 1 swing set.
Can be assembled either as a baby/toddler swing, as in the picture,
or as a higher swing with a backless-seat.
Currntyly packed in its original box with all original parts, so can be easily collected.
We only ever used the baby swing.

thing.name: Bath Bundle: Bath + Swivel Bath Seat + 3 Stools
thing.text:
A baby bath with non-slip strips.
A swivelling bath seat, with suction cups for attaching to bath floor.
3 Step stools, one with a stair.

thing.name: Toy Bundle
thing.text:
Big toy bundle, which includes:
- Car
- Table and chair
- Books (some brand new)
- Toys, some new and unopened

thing.name: Play Tent
thing.text: A Play Tent, in original bag. Hardly used and in perfect condition.

thing.name: Balance Bike
thing.text: Balance Bike, seat height can be adjusted.

thing.name: White Highchair
thing.text:
A white highchair.
The legs can be taken apart, so it's easy to collect.

thing.name: RedKite Baby Carrier + Japanese Baby Carrier
thing.text:
- RedKite baby carrier in original box, with instructions.
- A Japanese baby carrier (never used). Very light. Comes with instructions on paper and on DVD.

thing.name: Hauck Sleep'n Play Travel Cot
thing.text: Bought new, and was only used once.
